name: Thasos
desc: Mobile phone location data dating back to 2015 transformed into information that can be easily consumed and acted upon by investors and business managers. - MallStreams (sold and distributed by Bloomberg) - ConsumerStreams - IndustrialStreams
sectors: Consumer, Industrials, Real Estate, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail
why_us?: Thasos puts foot traffic intelligence at your fingertips.
advantages: Three+ years of cleaned and normalized data and highest level compliance to privacy standards is what truly sets Thasos apart.
